title: The Week of Ling Yang: The Heroic Guiding Light
summary: Ling Yang, a 56-year-old with a heart for guiding and tutoring, discovers her ability to transfer knowledge telepathically over the course of a week, leading her to thwart a cyber-attack on her city.
summaryGerman: Ling Yang, eine 56-jährige Person mit einer Leidenschaft für Führung und Tutoring, entdeckt im Laufe einer Woche ihre Fähigkeit, Wissen telepathisch zu übertragen, und verhindert damit einen Cyber-Angriff auf ihre Stadt.
summaryDutch: Ling Yang, een 56-jarige met een passie voor begeleiding en bijles, ontdekt gedurende een week haar vermogen om kennis telepathisch over te dragen, waardoor ze een cyberaanval op haar stad kan verijdelen.
summaryFrench: Ling Yang, une personne de 56 ans passionnée par le guide et le tutorat, découvre sa capacité à transférer des connaissances par télépathie au cours d'une semaine, ce qui lui permet de déjouer une cyberattaque sur sa ville.

story.text: Ling Yang felt an eerie sensation during her tutoring sessions, noting an unusual clarity in transmitting knowledge.
Confirming her suspicions, Ling discovers she can send complex ideas telepathically, leaving her students astounded and more enlightened than usual.
Harnessing this new power, Ling uses it to communicate with a distant student, helping him solve a critical exam problem just in time.
News of her abilities spreads, and Ling Yang is approached by city officials to help decode a cryptic cyber threat targeting municipal systems.
Focusing her skills, Ling connects telepathically with the city's lead IT expert, conveying complex cybersecurity concepts that fortify the city’s defenses.
Ling's efforts lead to successfully averting the cyber-attack, earning her praise and gratitude from the entire community.
Feeling a deep sense of fulfillment, Ling spends a peaceful day reflecting on her new role and the responsibilities it entails.

ending: Thus, Ling Yang embraced her role as 'The Heroic Guiding Light', determined to protect and educate with her unique gift.
moral: The greatest powers are often found within ourselves, waiting for the right moment to be discovered and used for the greater good.
